thread.title: Richard Skipper, State Farm Insurance
thread.title_full: ZipRecruiter reviewed by Richard Skipper, State Farm Insurance

author: Richard Skipper, State Farm Insurance
title: Richard Skipper, State Farm Insurance
text:
Louis, the rep who took my call, was professional, friendly, apologetic and solved my problem immediately. He sent immediate email confirmation of the resolution and offered his direct number for future communication.
Outstanding Customer Service !
